Klasse SuchView

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.Composite<com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout>
com.spirit.application.views.profil.Student.SuchView
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, Serializable
@Route(value="student/suche", layout=AppView.class) @RolesAllowed("student") public class SuchView extends com.vaadin.flow.component.Composite<com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout>
This view allows students to search for job postings based on various criteria, such as job type and search text (e.g., location, description, etc.). It displays a list of job postings and provides the option to view more details and apply for a position.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • SuchView

      @Autowired public SuchView(JobPostService jobPostService, SessionService sessionService, BewerbungService bewerbungService)
      Constructor for initializing the search view. It fetches all available job posts and updates the list displayed on the page.
      Parameter:
      jobPostService - service to interact with job posts
      sessionService - service for session management
      bewerbungService - service for managing applications

  • Methodendetails

    • searchbar

      public com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.HorizontalLayout searchbar()
      Creates and returns the search bar layout for filtering job posts. Includes a combo box for employment type and a text field for search terms.
      Gibt zurück:
      the search bar layout

    • createCard

      public com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout createCard(JobPostDTO jobPost)
      Creates a card layout for a job post. The card contains job details like the title, company, job type, location, and description.
      Parameter:
      jobPost - the job post to create the card for
      Gibt zurück:
      the card layout for the job post
